Metadata.title: Pokerly - Auto-track Poker Profits with Screenshots
Metadata.description: Auto-track Texas Hold'em, WPL and online poker profits with screenshots. AI extracts session data, calculates win rate and analyzes your bankroll.

subtitle.line1: Snap. Upload. Done. AI calculates your profits in 3 seconds.
subtitle.line2: Level up as you play and earn rewards by completing missions.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Analyze WPL, Hold'em and all poker games in 3 steps

step1.title: Capture
step1.desc: Take a screenshot of your game results

step2.title: Upload
step2.desc: Drag & drop or Ctrl+V to paste

step3.title: Analyze
step3.desc: AI automatically extracts data and generates statistics

cashGame.title: Automatically record session profits
cashGame.subtitle: Auto-detect WPL, Hold'em tables, hand count, and profits

tournament.title: Track tournament results perfectly
tournament.subtitle: Record buy-ins, prizes, rankings and calculate ROI

stats.title: See your poker skills in numbers
stats.subtitle: Analyze strengths and weaknesses with various stats and charts

aiCoach.title: AI Coach Analyzes Your Play
aiCoach.subtitle: GPT-4 powered AI analyzes your data and provides personalized coaching reports

analysis.title: Play Pattern Analysis
analysis.desc: Comprehensive analysis of session profits, time-based performance, and stake-level results

weakness.title: Weakness Diagnosis
weakness.desc: Data-driven identification of areas that need improvement

improvement.title: Custom Strategy Tips
improvement.desc: Specific improvement suggestions tailored to your play style

preview.title: AI Coach Report
preview.subtitle: Real-time Analysis
preview.sampleText: You've achieved +5.2 BB/100 at NL200 over the last 30 days. However, your 3bet frequency from late position seems a bit low. Increasing your steal frequency from the button could generate additional profit.

1.content: I used to record in Excel, but now I just take a screenshot. The time savings are incredible.
1.name: Player_K***

2.content: Tournament ROI is calculated automatically, so I can objectively see my skill level.
2.name: MTT_Pro***

3.content: It's fun to look at the stats. I use the BB/100 graph to find my leaks.
3.name: Shark_J***

level.title: Level Up as You Progress
level.subtitle: Earn XP and level up with every activity. Track your poker journey through our 8-tier level system.
level.highlight: Unlock special badges and titles as you level up!

missions.title: Complete Missions, Earn Rewards
missions.subtitle: Challenge yourself with various missions to earn XP. Win rate, profit, streaks, and more await you.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you need

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Poongpoong Studio ('Company') values your privacy when providing the Pokerly service ('Service') and complies with relevant privacy laws. This Privacy Policy explains what personal information we collect, how we use it, and how long we retain it.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect the following personal information to provide our services:

items.name: Name or nickname
items.gameData: Poker game data (sessions, profits, play time, etc.)

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: The collected information is used for the following purposes:

items.improvement: Service improvement and new feature development

storage.title: 4. Data Retention
storage.content: We retain your personal information until you delete your account or withdraw consent for data collection. However, information required by law will be retained for the legally mandated period.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except with your consent or when required by law.

items.deletion: Request deletion of your data (account deletion)

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We may use cookies to improve your experience. You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but some features may be limited.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at:

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: These Terms govern your use of the Pokerly service ('Service') provided by Poongpoong Studio ('Company'). By using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

items.illegal: Using the Service for illegal purposes
items.reverse: Reverse engineering or copying the Service

content.title: 5. User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of screenshots and game records you upload. However, we may use this content to provide and improve the Service.

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The Service and related software are owned by the Company. You may only use the Service for personal, non-commercial purposes and may not copy, distribute, or modify it.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the Service. We are not responsible for predicting game outcomes or guaranteeing profits. The Service is provided 'as is'.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service, including but not limited to data loss, profit loss, or loss of opportunity.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: You may stop using the Service and delete your account at any time. We may restrict Service access without notice if you violate these Terms.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms as needed. Modified Terms become effective upon notice through the Service. If you do not agree to the modified Terms, you may stop using the Service.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: For inquiries about the Service, please contact us at:
